conbody.p: The POST /tasks endpoint allows clients to create new tasks in the task management system. This endpoint is publicly accessible and does not require authentication.
A task represents a unit of work, including attributes such as title, description, due date, status, and priority.
Developers can use this endpoint to add tasks dynamically to a user's list or queue.

li.p: They enter task details such as the title, due date, and priority.
The application sends a POST request to /tasks with the task data.

ul.li: The server responds with 201 Created status and the created task details
